00016 // Building a trusted plugin for debugging.

00018 #include "third_party/npapi/bindings/npapi.h"
00019 #include "third_party/npapi/bindings/npapi_extensions.h"

00024 #include <map>

00026 #include "examples/tumbler/basic_macros.h"
00027 
00028 namespace tumbler {
00029 
00030 class Cube;
00031 
00032 // Extend NPDeviceContext3D to include a user_data pointer.  This pointer is
00033 // used to carry context-specific data for, e.g. the repaint callback.
00034 struct TumblerContext3D : NPDeviceContext3D {
00035   void* user_data_;
00036 };
00037 
00038 class Tumbler {
00039  public:
00040   explicit Tumbler(NPP npp);
00041 
00042   // The dtor makes the 3D context current before deleting the cube view, then
00043   // destroys the 3D context both in the module and in the browser.
00044   ~Tumbler();
00045 
00046   NPObject* GetScriptableObject();
00047 
00048   // SetWindow is called by the browser when the window is created, moved,
00049   // sized, or destroyed.
00050   NPError SetWindow(const NPWindow& window);
00051 
00052   // Called to post a notification that the module needs to be redrawn by the
00053   // browser.
00054   void PostRedrawNotification();
00055 
00056   // Called to draw the contents of the module's browser area.
00057   bool DrawSelf();
00058 
00059   // Accessor/mutators for the camera orientation in |cube_|.
00060   bool GetCameraOrientation(float* orientation) const;
00061   bool SetCameraOrientation(const float* orientation);
00062 
00063  private:
00064   // Create a 3D context both in the module and in the browser.  CreateContext()
00065   // used both PGL and Pepper to establish the 3D context.
00066   void CreateContext();
00067 
00068   // Tear down the 3D context.
00069   void DestroyContext();
00070 
00071   // TODO(dspringer): Once we get smart pointers in the Native Client SDK,
00072   // all the following pointers should become scoped_ptr<> types.
00073   NPP npp_;
00074   NPObject* scriptable_object_;
00075   NPDevice* device3d_;
00076   TumblerContext3D context3d_;
00077   PGLContext pgl_context_;
00078   Cube* cube_;
00079 
00080   DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(Tumbler);
00081 };
00082 
00083 }  // namespace tumbler
00084 
00085 #endif  // EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_TUMBLER_H_
